entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
